name: Squared (NMR1203)
description:
This game was made in scratch for the United Game Jam 2020. 

-Yes we are beginners

-Following the theme:

2 keys to collect, 2 platforms, 2 instruments in the music(only 2=piano and drums), and 2 mostly useless team members.

If the game isn't working in the browser then click here for the original page: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/407983783
